titleStmt.title: Thunder from heaven against the back-sliders and apostates of the times. In some meditations on the 24 chapter of Isaiah. / By W.A.
titleStmt.author: Aspinwall, William, fl. 1648-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Livewell Chapman, and are to be sold at the Crown in Popes-head-alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
